column447: D7. Your mental health is utmost important for the success of your doctoral research project, but also for a happy and fulfilled private life. This survey aims to raise awareness amongst you, your colleagues and the scientific community.   Please do not hesitate to turn to one of the included help lines, friends or your doctoral representatives, if especially emotionally touched by these questions.  Help lines: EMAP - Consultation Service for Employees. An external, anonymous, free service for employees and scholarship holders.  How does EMAP work? Call the phone number 0800 387 78 36 if you are in Germany or 00800 38 77 83 62 if you are abroad and give the name 'MPG'. Here you will receive support from experts who will advise you in German or English as necessary, also in other languages if the need arises.  More information for immediate help in your region can be found in this document.For more general information on mental health awarennes in PhDnet check out the following webpage.   Connect @maxplanckphdnet  On: PhDnet | Twitter | Facebook | Instagram & website  | PhDnet Team room on MAX  Email: steering.group@phdnet.mpg.de
